message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you can have the rest.  We can adjust things in later rounds if you'd prefer.
Let's meet in the middle, 60-40 seems fair to me.
I'm willing to split it closer to 55-45.  I think that's a good compromise, and we can avoid further inflation.
Considering the inflation, I think 70-30 is a fair deal now.
